description: Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended), in respect of a Section 73 (minor material amendment) application which comprises:-Three buildings ranging in height, up to 220m (increase in SQ2  from 36 storeys (121.33m Above Ordnance Datum, AOD) to 41 storeys (135.63m AOD) to the Consented Scheme, and changes to the basement level)- 934 residential units (45 additional residential units, to the Consented Scheme);- 1,887m2 (net internal area (NIA)) of office, Class B1 accommodation;- 2,280m2 NIA of small scale retail, restaurant / cafâ€š accommodation;- 908m2 NIA of creche space; and- Extensive public realm, including the incorporation of landscaping and publics spaces throughout the ground floor and roof terraces (changes to landscaping and playspace to the Consented Scheme)
site_name: South Quay Plaza, 183-189 Marsh Wall, London
